snippet: Facing a credit squeeze in southern Europe, the central bank wants to make it easier for banks to raise money to make loans.
abstract: European Central Bank takes steps to address credit squeeze in Southern Europe, making it easier for banks to bundle loans into securities that they could resell to investors and raise money for additional loans.
lead_paragraph: Facing a credit squeeze in southern Europe, the central bank wants to make it easier for banks to raise money to make loans.

headline.main: Europe’s Bank Takes Step to Ease Lending
